title: LF serious players to trial for a sister team to current our challenger team
body:
Hi guys

Think your good enough to play in challenger Ranked Teams?

GeneralManager will be trialing players to create a sister team to our current challenger team over the coming weeks, if you think your good enough or want to tryout and showcase your abilities this is your opportunity. 

* Reliability is a must - If you cant turn up at agreed upon times, do not bother wasting your time
* Must be able to work well with team and follow direction
* Ranked Teams experience is an advantage as you will be competing against other for your spot
* Pref diamond + unless you have that much of an awesome history i cant not trial you


Please Add Blzdragon (Coach) and CFO (team manager)

Trials will be from 6 pm on sat night aest

replies.body:
im interested, ign: mattsherona, add me if you wanna consider me (d5 jg)
http://plays.tv/u/Mattsherona
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=mattsherona

linked some random plays from the last week lol

(excuse 2 of my recent losses, i was vsing fucking chief spookzy, but i killed him 7 times ahah)

Hey Blzdragon,

Do you have any solo q requirements? 

I personally do not have the best solo q history but I do have a good team history.

On my last team I was the Jungler and Shot caller for Level Headed Gaming. We entered the Oceanic Open Ladder and in the 2 Bi-Weekly tournaments we entered we only lost games to Sin Gaming and Absolute Gaming. Also on the Cybergaming ladder we go to 8th place. Unfortunately our mid laner damaged his wrist and we had to forfeit all games over the last 2 weeks after having issues with our subs. While I have only played jungle on the teams I have been on in the past, I have been practicing ADC in Solo q to better understand bot lane and would happily move from jungle to support.

No official requirements, tho if your in solo q as silver you will have extremely hard time playing against diamond/master/challenger players. even myself as a plat solo q player cant match mechanically with the higher level players, i m yet to see a silver/gold that isnt a smurf that can win 9/10 matches v a diamond player, the only way i would really trial a silver or gold is if the match history was clearly phenomenal
Gl everyone, I would apply, but im a silver player sadly :(
I heard this team was a really good opportunity to prove myself! Add me plz
plenty have added, still need people for all positions
